title: Runes are broken
body:
So whenever I click on the "seal" runes to open up the "seal" tab... it doesn't open. Same with EVERY other tab. Then when I SPAM the open and close button, the runes appear for a split-second, but then disappear too quickly for me to grab it.

Help please.

replies.body:
That doesn't work, but let me show you a GIF of the problem..
[](https://gyazo.com/69ea70c51634cbb5f3901115e1cee4be)

Also, I use a USB mouse and a HP laptop. (Incase you need to know)

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
That is a GIF of the issue.

As you can see when I click it once, it doesn't show, but when I SPAM it... it shows for a split-second, but not enough time for me to grab it.

Hey there,

Could you try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if this helps.
